books.title: Sister Carrie
books.author: Theodore Dreiser
books.summary: A young woman moves to Chicago to chase her dream of being somebody.

books.title: Behind That Curtain
books.author: Earl Derr Biggers
books.summary: A Chinese detective is asked to assist in the solution of a missing woman and the murder of a detective from Scotland Yard.

books.title: The Autobiography of John Stuart Mill
books.author: John Stuart Mill
books.summary: The autobiography of English philosopher John Stuart Mill.

books.title: The Lives and Opinions of Eminent Philosophers
books.author: Diogenes Laërtius
books.summary: Brief biographies of the prominent philosophers of ancient Greece.

books.title: At the Back of the North Wind
books.author: George MacDonald
books.summary: A young boy’s life is transformed by his visit to the country at the back of the north wind.

books.title: Jurgen
books.author: James Branch Cabell
books.summary: Jurgen, a pawnbroker and “monstrous clever fellow,” is sent on a witty and parodic magical journey in search of true love.

books.title: Henry V
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: Shakespeare’s 1599 play chronicling the history of King Henry the Fifth and his famous victory over the French at the Battle of Agincourt.

books.title: The Gods of Pegāna
books.author: Lord Dunsany
books.summary: A mysterious god creates a cosmic pantheon to rule over its worlds and time.

books.title: Clarissa
books.author: Samuel Richardson
books.summary: A beautiful and virtuous young lady is entangled in the snares of a handsome but unscrupulous rake.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Manly Wade Wellman
books.summary: A collection of horror and science fiction stories by Manly Wade Wellman.

books.title: The Hashish Eater
books.author: Fitz Hugh Ludlow
books.summary: A philosophical contemplation of youthful adventures spent ingesting large doses of psychoactive cannabis extract.

books.title: The Man in Lower Ten
books.author: Mary Roberts Rinehart
books.summary: A young attorney is on his way to deliver evidence for a forgery case when he’s accused of killing a fellow train passenger.

books.title: The Cruise of the Alerte
books.author: E. F. Knight
books.summary: An English journalist sets sail in search of treasure buried on a remote desert island.

books.title: What’s Wrong with the World
books.author: G. K. Chesterton
books.summary: Philosopher G. K. Chesterton comments on various social issues of his day, including property, imperialism, feminism, and education.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Ameen Rihani
books.summary: A collection of Ameen Rihani’s poetry.

books.title: The Luck of Barry Lyndon
books.author: William Makepeace Thackeray
books.summary: A poor Irish rogue tries to win fame and fortune in the 18th-century English aristocracy.

books.title: Triplanetary
books.author: E. E. Smith
books.summary: In a universe where all powerful alien races influence the fates of worlds, a war erupts between the Triplanetary League of the inner solar system, pirates led by a mysterious and malicious scientist, and technologically advanced aliens.

books.title: School Stories
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: A collection of Wodehouse’s school stories about the lives and adventures of schoolboys in the early 1900s.

books.title: Unspoken Sermons
books.author: George MacDonald
books.summary: George MacDonald presents a set of interlocking sermons designed to shape the perception and life of the Christian disciple.

books.title: The Path to Rome
books.author: Hilaire Belloc
books.summary: Hilaire Belloc takes a walking pilgrimage to Rome from his hometown in France, writing of the journey, sketching the sights, and digressing on a wide variety of subjects.
